desc.en:
This adapter read tank level and other information from EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 and store in ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.de:
Dieser Adapter liest den Tankfüllstand und andere Informationen aus dem EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 und speichert ihn in ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.ru:
Этот адаптер считывает уровень в резервуаре и другую информацию из EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 и сохраняет в ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.pt:
Este adaptador lê o nível do tanque e outras informações do EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 e armazena no ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.nl:
Deze adapter leest het tankniveau en andere informatie van de EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 en slaat deze op in ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.fr:
Cet adaptateur lit le niveau du réservoir et d'autres informations d'EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 et stocke dans ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.it:
Questo adattatore legge il livello del serbatoio e altre informazioni da EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 e memorizza in ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.es:
Este adaptador lee el nivel del tanque y otra información de EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 y lo almacena en ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.pl:
Ten adapter odczytuje poziom w zbiorniku i inne informacje z EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 i zapisuje w ioBroker.
 EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 is also supported (tested by Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 is also supported (tested by christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 is also supported (tested by mikepiko)
desc.zh-cn: 该适配器从EPSON EcoTank ET-2750读取水箱液位和其他信息，并存储在ioBroker中。
desc.uk:
Цей адаптер зчитує рівень бака та іншу інформацію з EPSON EcoTank ET-2750 і зберігає в ioBroker.
 Також підтримується EPSON EcoTank ET-4750 (перевірено Homoran)
 EPSON EcoTank ET-3750 також підтримується (перевірено christofkac)
EPSON EcoTank ET-2721 також підтримується (перевірено mikepiko)

1.0.1.en:
Admin-UI has been adapted for small displays.
Dependencies have been updated.
1.0.1.de:
Admin-UI wurde für kleine Displays angepasst.
Abhängigkeiten wurden aktualisiert.
1.0.1.ru:
Admin-UI был адаптирован для небольших дисплеев.
Зависимость была обновлена.
1.0.1.pt:
Admin-UI foi adaptado para pequenos monitores.
As dependências foram atualizadas.
1.0.1.nl:
Beheerder-UI is aangepast voor kleine displays.
Afhankelijkheden zijn bijgewerkt.
1.0.1.fr:
Admin-UI a été adapté pour les petits affichages.
Les dépendances ont été actualisées.
1.0.1.it:
Admin-UI è stato adattato per piccoli display.
Le dipendenze sono state aggiornate.
1.0.1.es:
Admin-UI ha sido adaptado para pequeñas pantallas.
Se han actualizado las dependencias.
1.0.1.pl:
Admin- UI został dostosowany do małych wyświetlaczy.

Адмін-УІ адаптований для малих дисплеїв.

1.0.1.zh-cn:
Admin-UI已经适应了小型显示功能.
附属关系已经更新.

1.0.0.en:
Adapter has been moved to iobroker-community-adapter organisation.
Adapter requires js-controller 5, admin 6 and node.js 20 now.
Dependencies have been updated.
1.0.0.de:
Adapter wurde in die iobroker-community-Adapter-Organisation verschoben.
Adapter benötigt jetzt js-controller 5, admin 6 und node.js 20.
Abhängigkeiten wurden aktualisiert.
1.0.0.ru:
Адаптер был перемещен в организацию iobroker-community-adapter.
Adapter requires js-controller 5, admin 6 and node.js 20 now.
Зависимость была обновлена.
1.0.0.pt:
Adapter foi transferido para a organização iobroker-community-adapter.
Adaptador requer js-controller 5, admin 6 e node.js 20 agora.
As dependências foram atualizadas.
1.0.0.nl:
Adapter is verplaatst naar iobroker-community-adapter organisatie.
Adapter vereist js-controller 5, admin 6 en node.js 20 nu.
Afhankelijkheden zijn bijgewerkt.
1.0.0.fr:
L'adaptateur a été transféré à l'organisation iobroker-community-adaptateur.
Adaptateur nécessite js-controller 5, admin 6 et node.js 20 maintenant.
Les dépendances ont été actualisées.
1.0.0.it:
L'adattatore è stato spostato nell'organizzazione di iobroker-community-adapter.
Adattatore richiede js-controller 5, admin 6 e node.js 20 ora.
Le dipendenze sono state aggiornate.
1.0.0.es:
El adaptador ha sido trasladado a la organización yobroker-community-adapter.
Adaptador requiere js-controller 5, admin 6 y node.js 20 ahora.
Se han actualizado las dependencias.
1.0.0.pl:
Adapter został przeniesiony do organizacji iobroker- community- adapter.
Adapter wymaga sterownika js- controller 5, admin 6 i node.js 20.
Zaktualizowano zależność.
1.0.0.uk:
Переміщено перехід на iobroker-community-adapter.
Адаптер вимагає js-controller 5, admin 6 і node.js 20 тепер.
Оновлено залежність.
1.0.0.zh-cn:
适应者已经转移到了职业经纪人-社区适应者组织.
适配器现在需要js控制器5,admin 6和节点20.js.
附属关系已经更新.
